document_data.mainbody:
Othorion Keove was an elven warrior.
Othorion wore full elven mail armor.
In 26 DR, Othorion strongly opposed Iliphar Nelnueves decision to allow Faerlthann Obarskyr to become the first king of Cormyr.
In 900 DR, Othorion was the last survivor of Iliphars court and returned the court to Cormyr. He claimed that he had come to hunt. His arrival was on the eve of Cormyrs Battle with the Witch Lords and during the battle, Othorions elves arrived to aid Galaghard IIIs humans, swinging the battle in their favour and bringing them a victory. Othorion stated that he had felt like hunting orcs and goblins. Othorion gave his approval of the kingdom of Cormyr after the battle.
